root.name: Fieldrunners 2
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP, 2000, 2003, Vista, 7 and 8CPU Speed: Single-core 2.2 GHzRAM: 1 GBOS: Windows XP Service Pack 3Video Card: OpenGL 1.1 compliant with 256 MB of video RAM, no shader support necessarySound Card: YesFree Disk Space: 550 MBRecommendedOS: Windows XP, 2000, 2003, Vista, 7 and 8CPU Speed: Dual-core 2.4 GHzRAM: 2 GBOS: Windows Vista or 7Video Card: OpenGL 1.1 compliant with 512 MB of video RAM, no shader support necessarySound Card: YesFree Disk Space: 550 MB
